Example question 1: What color is the sky?

❯ 1. Blue
     The standard daytime color
  2. Red
     During sunset
  3. Gray
     Overcast day
  4. Type something.

──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
  5. Chat about this

Enter to select · Tab/Arrow keys to navigate · Esc to cancel
